title: Fix sync deadlock when project include filters skip first page
description: When project include/exclude filters are active, the sync API can return ops=[] for a page where every candidate op is filtered out. Expected: server should return a next_cursor that advances past the scanned window (even if all ops were skipped), so clients can progress until they reach allowed ops.
close_reason: Fixed sync deadlock when first page is fully filtered: client now advances last_applied_cursor from peer next_cursor when ops=[] and skipped>0 (validated cursor format and monotonic advance).
